description: Computes the correlation matrix of the input 1D files and their inverse correlation matrix.

dem_flag.title: Dem Flag
dem_flag.description: Remove mean from all vectors (conflicts with '-one').

cov_flag.title: Covariance Flag
cov_flag.description: Compute with covariance matrix instead of correlation.

inn_flag.title: Inner Product Flag
inn_flag.description: Compute with inner product matrix instead.

rank_flag.title: Rank Correlation Flag
rank_flag.description: Compute Spearman rank correlation instead (also implies '-terse').

terse_flag.title: Terse Output Flag
terse_flag.description: Output only the correlation or covariance matrix without any garnish.

okzero_flag.title: OK Zero Flag
okzero_flag.description: Do not quit if a vector is all zeros. The correlation matrix will have 0 where NaNs ought to go.
